testCases.name: Functional Application Test
testCases.description: Verify the application has actual functionality beyond basic placeholder content
steps: Check for multiple interactive elements (buttons, forms, navigation)
Verify application shows real features, not just 'Vite + React' placeholder text
Confirm professional UI design with proper branding
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application displays a professional ad performance analytics platform with functional features
testCases.failureCondition: If page only shows 'Vite + React' placeholder or basic template content, this test should FAIL

testCases.name: Landing Page Content Quality
testCases.description: Verify landing page has meaningful content and professional appearance
steps: Check for proper heading structure and branding
Look for testimonials or social proof
Verify responsive design on different screen sizes
testCases.expectedOutcome: Landing page shows professional content about ad performance analytics with clear value proposition

testCases.name: User Authentication Flow
testCases.description: Test complete user authentication including login, logout, and session management
steps: Verify successful authentication and redirect to dashboard
Check for user profile information in header/navigation
Verify redirect to landing page after logout
testCases.expectedOutcome: User can successfully authenticate and access protected areas

testCases.name: Invalid Login Credentials
testCases.description: Test error handling for invalid login attempts
steps: Verify appropriate error message is displayed
testCases.expectedOutcome: Clear error messages for invalid credentials without exposing sensitive information

testCases.name: Dashboard Navigation
testCases.description: Test navigation between different dashboard sections
steps: Verify each section loads without errors
testCases.expectedOutcome: All navigation links work and load appropriate content

testCases.name: Metrics Dashboard Display
testCases.description: Verify metrics dashboard shows performance data correctly
steps: Login and navigate to main dashboard
Check for KPI cards (spend, revenue, ROAS, CPA, etc.)
Verify charts and graphs are displayed
Look for trend indicators and insights
testCases.expectedOutcome: Dashboard displays comprehensive performance metrics with visual charts

testCases.name: Workspace Switching
testCases.description: Test ability to switch between different workspaces
steps: Login with user who has multiple workspaces (jane.smith@example.com)
Verify data updates to reflect new workspace
Check URL changes to include workspace ID
testCases.expectedOutcome: User can switch workspaces and see workspace-specific data

testCases.name: Campaign Management Interface
testCases.description: Test campaign management functionality and interface
steps: Look for filtering and sorting options
Verify platform indicators (Facebook, Google, TikTok, etc.)
testCases.expectedOutcome: Campaign management interface shows campaigns with performance data and management options

testCases.name: Creative Performance Analysis
testCases.description: Test creative performance tracking and analysis features
steps: Check performance metrics for each creative
Look for creative tags and categorization
testCases.expectedOutcome: Creative performance section shows visual creatives with detailed performance analytics

testCases.name: Data Upload Interface
testCases.description: Test data upload and processing interface
testCases.expectedOutcome: Upload interface allows file uploads with mapping templates and shows processing status

testCases.name: Alert System Interface
testCases.description: Test alert configuration and notification system
steps: Look for create new alert functionality
testCases.expectedOutcome: Alert system shows configurable rules with trigger history and notification options

testCases.name: Team Management Features
testCases.description: Test team member management and invitation system
steps: Look for invite new member functionality
testCases.expectedOutcome: Team management shows members with roles and invitation capabilities

testCases.name: Responsive Design - Mobile
testCases.description: Test application responsiveness on mobile devices
steps: Resize browser to mobile viewport (375px width)
Verify navigation menu adapts to mobile
Check that charts and tables are mobile-friendly
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application is fully functional and visually appropriate on mobile devices

testCases.name: Responsive Design - Tablet
testCases.description: Test application responsiveness on tablet devices
steps: Resize browser to tablet viewport (768px width)
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application layout adapts well to tablet screen sizes with good usability

testCases.name: Data Visualization Charts
testCases.description: Test chart rendering and interactivity
testCases.expectedOutcome: Charts display correctly with proper data visualization and interactivity

testCases.name: Date Range Filtering
testCases.description: Test date range selection and data filtering
steps: Locate date range selector on dashboard
Test preset date ranges (Today, Last 7 days, Last 30 days)
Verify data updates when date range changes
Check that all metrics reflect the selected period
testCases.expectedOutcome: Date filtering works correctly and updates all relevant data displays

testCases.name: Platform Comparison View
testCases.description: Test cross-platform performance comparison features
steps: Verify multiple platforms are displayed (Facebook, Google, TikTok, Snapchat)
Check performance metrics for each platform
testCases.expectedOutcome: Platform comparison shows clear performance differences across advertising platforms

testCases.name: Search and Filtering Functionality
testCases.description: Test search and filter capabilities across different sections
steps: Look for search boxes in campaigns, creatives, and other list views
Try filtering by platform, status, date ranges
testCases.expectedOutcome: Search and filtering help users find specific data quickly and accurately

testCases.name: Notification System
testCases.description: Test in-app notification display and management
steps: Look for notification bell or indicator in header
testCases.expectedOutcome: Notification system displays relevant alerts and system messages with proper management options

testCases.name: User Profile Settings
testCases.description: Test user profile management and preferences
testCases.expectedOutcome: User can view and modify profile settings and preferences

testCases.name: Network Error Handling
testCases.description: Test application behavior during network issues
steps: Simulate network disconnection (disable network in dev tools)
Try to navigate to different sections
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application handles network errors gracefully with clear user feedback

testCases.name: Loading States and Performance
testCases.description: Test loading indicators and application performance
steps: Check page load times are reasonable (<3 seconds)
Test that loading states don't block user interaction unnecessarily
Check for progressive loading of content
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application provides clear loading feedback and maintains good performance

testCases.name: Data Export Functionality
testCases.description: Test data export features if available
steps: Look for export buttons in data tables/charts
Test different export formats (CSV, PDF, Excel)
Check export file naming and timestamps
testCases.expectedOutcome: Data export features work correctly and provide accurate data in requested formats

testCases.name: Basic Accessibility Compliance
testCases.description: Test basic accessibility features and compliance
steps: Test keyboard navigation through the interface
Check for proper heading structure (H1, H2, H3)
Verify alt text on images and icons
Check for focus indicators on interactive elements
Test with screen reader simulation if possible
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application meets basic accessibility standards for keyboard navigation and screen readers

testCases.name: Security and HTTPS
testCases.description: Verify security measures and HTTPS implementation
steps: Check for secure connection indicator in browser
Test that HTTP redirects to HTTPS
Check that sensitive data is transmitted securely
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application enforces HTTPS and implements proper security measures

test_execution_notes.browser_compatibility: Test in Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge
test_execution_notes.test_data_source: Uses seeded database with sample users and workspaces
test_execution_notes.authentication_required: Most tests require valid user authentication
test_execution_notes.network_conditions: Test under normal and slow network conditions

success_criteria.critical_tests: All critical priority tests must pass
success_criteria.high_priority: At least 90% of high priority tests must pass
success_criteria.overall_pass_rate: At least 85% of all tests must pass
success_criteria.no_blocking_issues: No test failures that prevent core functionality
